description: Describes the most recent volume modification request for the specified EBS volumes.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Attackers might modify volume characteristics to prepare data for exfiltration or conceal their activity. The history of volume modifications can reveal such attempts.
Viewing volume modifications might help attackers understand cloud account structures and usage patterns, aiding in discovering privileged accounts
Volume modification details might indicate attempts to obfuscate data within volumes, thus evading detection mechanisms.

securityImplications: Attackers might use DescribeVolumesModifications to track changes in EBS volumes.
